definition: horizontal rectangular inscribed tablet hung over a door or on a wall/shallow round woven bamboo basket

sentences.english: His tale is recorded on a mountain-top plaque.
sentences.chinese: 他的這個故事已經記錄在了山頂的一個牌匾上。

sentences.english: There is a commemorative plaque to the artist in the village hall.
sentences.chinese: 村公所裏有一塊紀念該藝術家的牌匾。

sentences.english: This board were cast in bronze not in gold.
sentences.chinese: 這個牌匾是銅鑄的，否則金鑄的。

sentences.english: Your plaque will be forwarded upon payment of your first full year's subscription or first renewal.
sentences.chinese: 牌匾將在全額付訖首年會費或首次續費後寄送給您。

sentences.english: Signature logo plaque and gold-tone detailed hardware.
sentences.chinese: 簽名標識的牌匾和金音詳細的硬件。

sentences.english: The plaque is the title section of the finishing touch pen.
sentences.chinese: 牌匾的題款乃是畫龍點睛之筆。

sentences.english: The signboard at the entrance was inscribed by the K'anghsi (Kangxi) emperor in 1699.
sentences.chinese: 入口的牌匾由康熙皇帝與1699年題寫。

sentences.english: This board am cast in bronze not in gold.
sentences.chinese: 這個牌匾是銅鑄的，並非金鑄的。

sentences.english: They unveiled the plaque to open the new school.
sentences.chinese: 他們揭開牌匾爲新學校主持揭幕禮。

sentences.english: Nearby， a plaque memorialised a local engineer.
sentences.chinese: 附近，有塊紀念當地一位工程師的牌匾。

definition: horizontal rectangular inscribed tablet hung over a door or on a wall/shallow round woven bamboo basket
variant of 匾額|匾额[bian3 e2]
area above the lintel of a doorway
couplet (hung on each side of the door frame)
lintel (of a door)/fig. family's social status
a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)
